info.title: PolyRouter Prediction Markets API
info.description:
Comprehensive API for accessing prediction market data across multiple platforms including Polymarket, Kalshi, and Manifold Markets.

## Features
- **Unified Data Access**: Single API for multiple prediction market platforms
- **Real-time Data**: Live market prices, volumes, and trending analysis
- **Historical Data**: Price history and market analytics
- **Advanced Filtering**: Category, platform, and status-based filtering
- **Rate Limiting**: Tiered access with usage tracking
- **Authentication**: API key-based authentication with Supabase integration

## Supported Platforms
- **Polymarket**: Decentralized prediction markets on Polygon
- **Kalshi**: US-regulated prediction markets
- **Manifold Markets**: Community prediction markets

## Rate Limits
- **Free Tier**: 100 requests/minute, 10,000 requests/month
- **Starter Tier**: 500 requests/minute, 50,000 requests/month
- **Pro Tier**: 2,000 requests/minute, 200,000 requests/month
- **Enterprise**: Custom limits

## Authentication

**Both API Key and Bearer Token are required for all requests.**

### Required Headers
```bash
curl -H "X-API-Key: test_1234567890abcdef" \
     -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6InB0YWhyaWNvd2h6c3hmaHFudnFlIiwicm9sZSI6ImFub24iLCJpYXQiOjE3NTcwMzA3NTMsImV4cCI6MjA3MjYwNjc1M30.aDVTn1GrFatkivIa7Lr1tADc8ud1T3nF5DnyVweaUcE" \
     https://ptahricowhzsxfhqnvqe.supabase.co/functions/v1/markets-v1
```

### Individual Components
- **API Key**: `X-API-Key` header for API access control
- **Bearer Token**: `Authorization: Bearer` header for Supabase authentication

get.description: Retrieve real-time markets across all supported platforms. Keep in mind, search queries will not filter by status, and return based on relevance.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Filter by platform (single value only, not comma-separated): polymarket, kalshi, limitless, manifold

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by market status (comma-separated): open, closed

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search markets by name or description

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results per page (1-25)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination

parameters.name: include_raw
parameters.description: Include raw data from the platform API

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific market using platform-native IDs

parameters.name: market_id
parameters.description: Platform-native market identifier

parameters.name: include_raw
parameters.description: Include raw data from the platform API

get.description: Retrieve historical price data using platform-specific market identifiers. This endpoint uses platform-native IDs and fetches data directly from platform APIs for improved performance. Currently, only Polymarket, Kalshi, and Limitless are supported.

parameters.name: market_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of platform-specific market IDs

parameters.name: start_ts
parameters.description: Start timestamp (Unix timestamp) - Required for data retrieval

parameters.name: end_ts
parameters.description: End timestamp (Unix timestamp) - Required for data retrieval

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Time interval - Required

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of data points per market (1-5000)

total_points.description: Total number of data points returned

platforms.description: List of platforms included in response

get.description: Retrieve real-time bid/ask order book data and order depth for prediction markets. This endpoint supports both Polymarket and Kalshi platforms, returning a unified format with normalized price data.

parameters.name: market_id
parameters.description: Platform-native market identifier (Polymarket numeric ID or Kalshi ticker)

error.message: Market invalid_market_id not found on any supported platform (Polymarket or Kalshi)
An unexpected error occurred while fetching orderbook

details.error: Kalshi credentials not configured. Please set KALSHI_ACCESS_KEY and KALSHI_PRIVATE_KEY environment variables.

error.message: An unexpected error occurred while fetching orderbook

get.description: Retrieve historical orderbook snapshots that are collected every 30 minutes for Polymarket markets. This endpoint allows you to query past orderbook states to analyze market depth, liquidity changes, and trading patterns over time.

parameters.name: market_id
parameters.description: Polymarket market ID

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Platform name

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start time in Unix timestamp (milliseconds)

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End time in Unix timestamp (milliseconds)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of snapshots to return (max: 500)

error.message: No orderbook snapshots found for the specified market and time range

get.description: Retrieve historical trade data for prediction markets on Kalshi and Polymarket. This endpoint allows you to query past trades to analyze trading activity, volume patterns, and market dynamics over time. The endpoint automatically detects the platform based on market ID format (Kalshi tickers start with 'KX', Polymarket uses numeric IDs).

parameters.name: market_id
parameters.description: Platform-native market identifier (Polymarket numeric ID or Kalshi ticker symbol)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of trades to return (1-1000). Kalshi API maximum is 100 per request.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Opaque cursor for pagination (from previous response)

error.message: Market INVALID_MARKET not found on any supported platform

details.kalshi_error: Failed to fetch trades from Kalshi: Kalshi API error: 404 Not Found

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of the data point

cache_hit.description: Whether response was served from cache

platform_id.description: Original platform market ID (same as id)

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of the data point

bids.description: Array of bid orders (sorted by price, descending)

asks.description: Array of ask orders (sorted by price, ascending)

depth.description: Total order depth (sum of all bid and ask sizes)

neg_risk.description: Whether market allows negative risk (Polymarket only)

start_time.description: Start time query parameter (Unix timestamp in milliseconds)

end_time.description: End time query parameter (Unix timestamp in milliseconds)

yes_hash.description: Hash of YES token orderbook snapshot

no_hash.description: Hash of NO token orderbook snapshot

trade_id.description: Unique trade identifier (UUID for Kalshi, transaction hash for Polymarket)

yes_price.description: Yes price at time of trade (Kalshi only)

no_price.description: No price at time of trade (Kalshi only)

total.description: Number of trades returned in this response

next_cursor.description: Cursor for next page (null if no more pages)
